message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.
I appreciate your time and consideration, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I'm confident it's a great value, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.
